title: Master Limited Partnerships Parity Act
content: Master Limited Partnerships Parity Act This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax treatment of publicly traded partnerships as corporations, to expand the definition of quot, qualifying incomequot. For such partnerships to include income and gains from renewable and alternative energy generation projects and related infrastructure for transportation or storage, including energy derived from thermal resources, waste, renewable fuels and chemicals, energy efficient buildings, gasification, and carbon capture in secure geological storage.
